ColourWords.Title: Comparative adjectives
ColourWords.Instruction: Click on the comparative adjectives in the texts. There are ten comparative adjectives.

ContentColourWords.Sentence: I like going to the movies and I like most types of film, but I don't like thrillers. I prefer funnier,lighterfilms, such as comedies. I like horror films too because they'rescarierthan adventure films or thrillers, and sometimes they're very clever.
The weather in our country isbetterin spring than in autumn. It's usuallywarmer andsunnierin the spring, and the days arelonger.

Jeff and Will are brothers but they're very different. Jeff'stallerandthinnerthan Will. Jeff's a composer and he's very musical. Will's a lawyer and he's very clever. Will'sdarkerthan Jeff and he wears glasses.
